projects.title: Personal Website (you're looking at it!)
projects.description: This very website! I redesigned it from the ground up to be more visually appealing, easier to navigate, and more informative about who I am and what I do.

projects.title: Turbo
projects.description: A web-based tool that helps developers quickly and efficiently manage application and feature flag deployment pipelines.

projects.title: Turbo Agents
projects.description: An AI-assisted extension of Turbo that lets AI Agents manage and execute deployment pipelines, troubleshoot oncall alerts, and more!

projects.title: ALPHA Observability
projects.description: Set up detailed dashboards for developers to view application status and metrics, and configured alerting to notify developers of any issues in real time.

projects.title: PokeClaim Discord Bot
projects.description: A Discord bot that allows community members to nickname Pokemon for streamers to use in their playthrough streams. Also included a web dashboard for easy viewing.

projects.title: Head Lab Teaching Assistant
projects.description: Redesigned labs to be more concise and focused, created detailed lecture slides to introduce topics, and lectured to students on Java programming and data structures. Also provided mentorship and support to students during office hours and in-class.
